name: ASRECorp
description: Your company has discovered a machine that can transport people to different worlds and nightmares, as the newly appointed scientist you must discover the reason a machine that can take you to such places even exists.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Operating System Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 1.5ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI RadeonHD 4550 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: glitchy and poorly thought out game play, dont waste your money

An FPS exploration and puzzle solving game that visually looks quite good.  Game needs some proper options in the menu (controls/graphics).  Overall the game needs some tlc to polish things up a bit.  I'll adjust my review and add some detail if it ever happens.

Really nice fps adventure game and well made with gorgeous graphics and story. Like the way that you walk around free ways for exploring and searching for hidden puzzles or such. It has great potential, great sound and very interesting game. I would recomend it.
